DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate oxytocin 's effect interoception whether effect vary function different emotional valence .
DOC.detailed_description: The present study use double-blind , between-subject , placebo-controlled design investigate modulatory effect oxytocin interoception whether effect vary function emotional valence . In Experiment 1 , subject perform heartbeat detection task group difference oxytocin placebo group interoceptive accuracy neural activity core interoceptive network investigate . In Experiment 2 , subject ask watch emotional face perform heartbeat detection task . Investigators examine whether oxytocin 's effect interoception vary function different emotional valence .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Subjects report neurological problem , psychiatric illness drug alcohol abuse none currently take form medication drunk caffeinecontaining beverage day experiment .
